property.name: Text
property.value: As a full action, Thorg may place a guard marker on himself, and then may place his Taunt marker on a target non-Mage creature up to 1 zone away and in LoS.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Flying, Familiar, Spellbind, Pest, Mind Mage Only

property.name: Text
property.value: You may bind a non-Epic Level 1-2 attack or incantation spell from your Spellbook to Thoughtspore. Thoughtspore can cast only the spell bound to it, and the spell cannot be changed.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Zone Exclusive, Flame +2, Legendary, Warlord Only

property.name: Text
property.value: Akiro's Hammer starts with 1 Load token on it. Each Upkeep Phase place 1 token on it (to a maximum of 2). Before or after any friendly Action Phase, you may remove 2 tokens to make 1 of its 2 attacks listed above.

property.name: Text
property.value: May not be placed in a zone adjacent to another friendly outpost. Once per round, when a friendly soldier in this zone declares a ranged attack, Archer's Watchtower may give this solder the Ranged +1 and Indirect traits for that attack. Use a ready maker to keep track of this ability. [ReadyMarker]

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spawnpoint, Zone Exclusive, Flame +2, Epic, Warlord Only

property.name: Text
property.value: May not be placed in a zone adjacent to another friendly outpost. X = the number of outposts you control, with a maximum value of 3. During the Deployment Phase, if there is 2 or more mana on Barracks, It may summon 1 soldier creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: May not be placed in a zone adjacent to another friendly outpost. Whenever your Mage, or a War spawnpoint he controls, summons a friendly soldier creature, you may choose to summon it to Garrison Post's zone, regardless of range or LoS.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you lose or pay mana, including upkeep costs and Mana Drain/Transfer effects, place that mana on Mare Prism instead. If the mana was being transferred to their supply, cancel that transfer. During the Chanel Phase you may remove 2 mana from Mana Prism and place it in your supply.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mangler Caltrops attacks each non-Flying creature immediately after it enters the zone. Mangler Caltrops hinders non-Flying creatures. Ranged attacks cannot target Caltrops

property.name: Text
property.value: Target creature is Restrained, and gains the Unmovable trait. At the end of each of its Action Phases, place a Sink token on Quicksand. When there are 4 Sink tokens on Quicksand, destroy it and the creature. As a quick action, creature may roll 1d12 to escape, subtracting 1 for each Sink token. On an 8+ destroy Quicksand. X = the creature's Level. Quicksand cannot target creatures with the Uncontainable trait. [Restrained] [Unmovable]

property.name: Text
property.value: As a quick action, friendly Living creatures in this zone may drink; Roll 3 attack dice and heal that much damage from that creature. Additionally, you I may remove 1 condition from that creature by paying its removal cost.

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Sharpened Pikes;action type=Passage Attack;dice=5;This attack is only made against creatures which pass through this wall from the direction the top of the card is facing.=True

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Sharpened Pikes: [Passage Attack] [Dice=5] [This attack is only made against creatures which pass through this wall from the direction the top of the card is facing.]

property.name: Text
property.value: Charm can only be revealed between Acton Phases. This creature cannot make a melee or ranged attack against the controller of Charm. If the controller of Charm attacks and damages this creature, destroy Charm. X = Creature's Level -1.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains a Damage Barrier

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature's melee attacks gain the Unavoidable trait. [Unavoidable]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature is Restrained and gains the Unavoidable trait. Each Upkeep Phase, if Force Crush's upkeep cost is paid, this creature receives 2 direct damage. Does not affect creatures with the Uncontainable trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forcefield starts with 3 Forcefield tokens on it. During the Upkeep Phase it gains 1 token, to a maximum of 3. Whenever you are attacked, before the Avoid Attack Step, you must remove a token. I you do, that attack is canceled.

property.name: Text
property.value: All friendly Corporeal creatures in this zone gain Armor +2.

property.name: Text
property.value: You control this creature. Mind Control can only be revealed between Action Phases, and the controller must be within 1 zone of Mind Control. When Mind Control is revealed or removed, place a Stun condition on this creature. X = Target creature's Level. Mind Control cannot be moved to a new target. During the Upkeep Phase, Mind Control's upkeep cost must be paid before any other upkeep costs on this creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mind Shield may be revealed during the Counter Spell or Avoid Attack steps to counter a psychic spell or cancel a psychic attack, respectively. If a psychic enchantment is revealed on this creature, you may immediately reveal Mind Shield; Cancel and destroy that enchantment before its reveal costs are paid. Then, destroy Mind Shield.

property.name: Text
property.value: All other friendly creatures in the same zone gain Melee +1 and Armor +1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, you can use Dancing Scimitar as a Defense, or it can make its attack. Use a ready marker to keep track of its use. [Defense 8+ 1x No Ranged]

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage may add +1 to the d12 roll each time he uses a Defense to avoid an attack [Defense +1]

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when she casts or reveals a force spell. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed. [Casting Discount] [1] [Force] [x1]

property.name: Text
property.value: You may bind a non-Epic command incantation spell from your spellbook to Helm of Command. As a quick spell, you may pay 1 mana to change the bound spell

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever the Warlord uses his Battle Orders ability, he may pay an additional 3 mana during the Cast Spell Step to extend the spell's range so that it affects all friendly soldiers in the arena.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, you may pay 1 less upkeep for up to 3 different Mind spells you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when he casts or reveals a command spell. Enchantments only receive this discount when they are revealed. [Casting Discount] [1] [Command] [x1]

property.name: Text
property.value: Sectarus is a non-creature familiar, which can be used to cast only curse enchantments. If Sectarus is used to attack and damage a creature, it may immediately cast the spell on that creature as a free action

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and the Lightning -2 trait. [Armor +2] [Lightning -2]

property.name: cAttacks
property.value: name=Quick Swing;action type=Quick;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=4||name=Power Swing;action type=Full;range type=Melee;range=(0,0);dice=4;effects={7: ['Daze']};Sweeping=True

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy all enchantments in target zone (both revealed and hidden), regardless of what they are attached to.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target up to 2 adjacent zones, as long as at least one zone is in range and LoS. All Corporeal conjurations in target zones, including a wall between the two zones, receive an Unavoidable attack of 4 attack dice. Roll the effect die for each creature in the zones; on a 5+ it receives the Slam condition. Earthquake has no effect on Flying, Incorporeal, or Unmovable creatures.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target creature is Pushed 1 zone in the direction of your choice. This will not Push it through a wall with the Passage Attacks trait, unless you pay on additional 3 mana when this spell is cast. If the Push moved the target, give it the Slam condition, and you may choose a secondary target creature in that zone and also give it the Slam condition.

property.name: Text
property.value: All creature in target zone are Pushed 1 zone away in the same direction. This will not Push them through a wall with the Passage Attacks trait, unless you pay an additional 3 mana when this spell is cast.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place a Sleep condition marker on each non-Mage Living creature in target zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target gains the Melee +2 trait for its next melee attack this round. Melee +2

property.name: Text
property.value: All creatures in target zone, except the caster, are Pushed 1 zone away in a random direction. Roll separately for each creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target's next ranged attack this round, gains the Unavoidable and Piercing +1 traits. This spell has no effect no zone attacks. If the attack targets more than one object, this spell only affects an attack against the first target.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose an equipment object attached to attached to target Mage. You control that equipment. You may immediately destroy it; Or, if you can legally attach it to yourself, you may do so, returning any item in that location slot to your spellbook. X = the chosen equipments casting cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once this round, if this creature uses a full action to make a quick action melee attack it may use that attack against up to 3 different target objects in its zone. It attacks each target, one after the other, in the same manner as the Sweeping trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy target revealed enchantment. X = total mana cost of target enchantment (hidden plus reveal cost).

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 5 attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy target hidden enchantment. Controller of target enchantment cannot reveal the enchantment once Seeking Dispel has been cast.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 8 attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal each friendly Living creature in the target zone the amount rolled on 5 attack dice. Roll separately for each creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you cast Dissolve, choose an equipment object attached to target Mage. Destroy the chosen equipment. X = equipment's casting cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target creature is Pushed 1 zone in the direction of your choice. If the target is Pushed through a wall with the Passage Attacks trait, you must pay an additional 3 mana. This has no effect on Unmovable creatures.
